title: News24.com | Ramaphosa summonses Ndabeni-Abrahams to a meeting over lockdown lunch
description: President Cyril Ramaphosa has summoned Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, to a meeting to discuss a purported social media post of her having lunch with former deputy higher education minister Mduduzi Manana.
content:
President Cyril Ramaphosa has summoned Communications Minister Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, to a meeting to discuss a purported social media post of her having lunch with former deputy higher education minister Mduduzi Manana.
The picture sparked debate on wheth… [+3316 chars]
